text: Youxie ren [mu sheng shidai dui shandong ren de zhenglun zhe] shuo:“[Tamen] shi san ge, di si ge shi tamen de gou.” Ling yixie ren shuo:“[Tamen] shi wu ge, di liu ge shi tamen de gou.” Zhexie shi caice wei jian zhi wu. Hai you yixie ren shuo:“[Tamen] shi qi ge, di ba ge shi tamen de gou.” Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo de zhu zui zhidao tamen de shumu, ciwai, zhiyou shaoshu ren zhidao tamen [de zhenxiang].” Chule yong [wo yi qishi ni de] mingzheng wai, ni ji buyao tong tamen zhenglun tamen [shandong ren] de shumu, ye buyao xiang renhe ren [ru youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu] qingjiao tamen [shandong ren] de shiqing.
